description:
An array of colored bands stretching across the plot area marking an interval on the axis.

In styled mode, the plot bands are styled by the .highcharts-plot-band class in addition to the className option.

children.name: acrossPanes
children.description: Flag to decide if plotBand should be rendered across all panes.

children.name: borderColor
children.description: Border color for the plot band. Also requires borderWidth to be set.

children.name: borderWidth
children.description: Border width for the plot band. Also requires borderColor to be set.

children.name: className
children.description: A custom class name, in addition to the default highcharts-plot-band, to apply to each individual band.

children.name: events
children.description: An object defining mouse events for the plot band. Supported properties are click, mouseover, mouseout, mousemove.

children.name: from
children.description: The start position of the plot band in axis units.

children.name: id
children.description: An id used for identifying the plot band in Axis.removePlotBand.

children.name: to
children.description: The end position of the plot band in axis units.

children.name: zIndex
children.description: The z index of the plot band within the chart, relative to other elements. Using the same z index as another element may give unpredictable results, as the last rendered element will be on top. Values from 0 to 20 make sense.
